basics.name: Adwiteeya
basics.label: Developer
basics.summary: System Engineer at Infosys with a specialization in Business Intelligence, Python, React and Database

education.institution: ABV-Indian Institute of Information Technology and Management, Gwalior, MP, IN
N C College of Engineering, Panipat, HR, IN

highlights: Working on Business Intelligence technologies and tools
Build business dashboards which shows market trend analysis of customer’s purchasing pattern
Enhanced the performance of SSRS reports by eliminating unnecessary joins, columns etc.

Worked on a capstone project related to customer credit card details, performed cleansing, de-duplication, and harmonization of data across various systems, that was analysed by the experts as 94% accurate
Worked on enhancing security of client’s information
Troubleshooting of SAP Enterprises, Outlook and SharePoint
Configured real time routers and worked with protocols like FTP, Telnet along with assignment of IP’s to devices
Got an opportunity to work with CWG network engineers at MTNL Headquarters (among 40 interns)

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2015.  See my portfolio site for more details.
